text: Razve etikh neblagodarnykh zhdot chto-libo, krome gorya i mucheniya, podobnykh tem, kotoryye postigli narody Nukha, Musy i drugikh poslannikov?! Skazhi im, o prorok: "Yesli vy zhdote chego-to drugogo, to zhdite, i ya s vami budu zhdat'. Dlya vas tol'ko porazheniye v nastoyashchey zhizni i nakazaniye v Den' voskreseniya
